Room.Name: Discount Armor Shoppe
Room.ShortDescription: You certainly want to go into the arena with good armor.
Room.LongDescription: A big, dumb looking half-giant stands behind the counter, wearing a leather apron and a slack-jawed look. His eyes are quite dull, so don't ask for advice. He might give you some, and if you took it, you might be sorry. He has a list of armor for sale. If you are looking for small-race armor, why don't you try across the street?
